price: Mu vy’ukuri, Ibrahimu yari indongozi mu bugwaneza vy’ukuri[347], agamburukira Imana Allah, asenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah yicishije bugufi, kira noneho Ibrahimu ntiyari no mu babangikanyamana;
arabic: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةٗ قَانِتٗا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: [347] Ibrahimu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) yari indongozi ingana umugwi w’abantu mu kudatirigana ku kuri.

meta.transliteration: inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
